lead_paragraph: RAYLESBERG--Daniel. Died peacefully on April 26 at the age of 98. He is survived by his wife Sally, to whom he was married for more than 70 years, his children, Alan (Caren) and Iris (Michael) and four grandchildren, Lisa, Hallie, Jason and Robert. We will miss him greatly. 1/3
